title: Free Me Please
body: A couple of days ago I was banned due to my toxicity in-game, I really couldn’t believe it but I was hoping that I could get attention on this account because I really want it back, before that though I was banned for 2 weeks in May and ever since then I was reformed but then I got into a game where I had intentional feeders causing to lose the game and making super upset because I am competitive and I hate losing, I do know yes this isn’t an excuse to my behavior but I just want you to understand the Human Factor as well I’ve have not played since because I don’t wanna make a new account and have to start over again, but yeah I’m just hoping that you guys can work with me to get a solution to where this ban can be lifted and yes I know don't you really lift permabans but I just you to understand that and I know what I did and accept full responsibility of my actions, but if I can’t get this account back I don’t know what to do with myself anymore I’ve spent so much time and money and I have that account for 3 years so I’m really hoping again that we can work something out to get it unbanned whatever it takes please help me with this situation please community and Dev reading this let's please work something out please and thank you!

I was in the game with infinity, the other players in the game were being toxic towards me, and infinity tried to cool down the situation by telling the team to just play the game, and focus because we could win. The Duo would not listen to him, and kept being toxic towards me. In the matter of 10 minutes, the players were extremely negative, and I was positive again. We could easily win the game if they would just focus, and infinity told them this. When he said that we could win, they started talking trash about him saying he wasn’t even doing that well (even though he was) but they would not stop. Before we knew it, one of them was like 1/9 and the other was AFK, but the rest of the team was doing ok together and we won a team fight. When we started winning fights again, the AFK player came back, tried for like 2 minutes, died, then decided to repeatedly kill himself in game. Towards the end of the game, Infinity said something with some sort of slang attached with it, and one of the players said Something like “lol are you black?” Infinity responded with yes, and the player started to make fun of him in chat because he said he was. 

Of all the things I have seen in this game, what infinity did is the last thing I would guess would end up in a Ban. He tried defending a teammate, and a friend, and ended up getting banned for it.
